name: D3L3T3.exe - Aplicativo do Mal a origem
name_original: D3L3T3.exe - Aplicativo do Mal a origem
description:
Strange reports and rumors take you to a graveyard in a search for answers.
This short first-person game seeks to explore the beginning of a curse wich,
as well as the the times, evolves and intensifies.
With nothing more than a curse and a flashlight in hand, look for items that can help you venture further into the darkness.
Unravel the abyss and find enlightenment... or get ready to die trying.
